content.description: Great steep line. Short lock off's on good edges lead to a big pocket and a big move to the finish jug!
content.protection: Boulder pads and some dedicated spotters.
content.location: West Side Warrior is the farthest left route. It's right of the small cave and starts just below the large crack system.

content.description: Standing two handed start on the triangle crimp, up to two good pockets, right hand to a bad crimp, to a Gaston with the left, big bump move to a two finger pocket, then up to a three finger pocket and then top out
content.location: Directly right of low effort middle finger

content.protection: Two or more bouldering Pads at least, and a good spotter.
content.location: Just right/south of the Gorilla Boulder. The start is just at the the bottom of the obvious crack in the middle of the boulder.

content.description: Sit start on the big obvious pocket and go directly straight up. Very balancy on small holds.
content.location: The Gorilla Boulder is about 100 yards below The Saloon, before going up the rope system ; the obvious black and white streaked boulder with the climbable face being on the northwest side of the boulder. There are three routes on this boulder, Tickphobia being the middle route.

content.description: Slightly bigger moves but just as balancy as Tickphobia. Careful the rock is sharp on this boulder!
content.location: RMSF (Rocky Mountain Spotted Fever) is located on the Gorilla Boulder. It is the farthest route on the right, and it shares the same sit-start as Tickphobia, but heads out right and then up.

content.description: Follows the crack system from the bottom left until you meet back up with To Breathless Oblivion follows the route the rest of the way
content.location: Starts at the beginning of the crack system to the left of To a Breathless Oblivion

content.description:
Unsure about whether or not this is a developed boulder but I couldn’t find any information on mountain project or from any other sources, if information needs to be added or changed let me know

Very fun but very chossy, hopefully will clean up with more traffic.

Start with both hands on the low side pull, go up the short flake, grab a pinch just above the flake, make a big move to a good pocket and top out.

content.location: Also located on the Gorilla Boulder, this is the farthest route on the left. For the start, you match on a slopey edge with both hands. There is a small rating written in chalk just beside it.

content.description: Start in the cave to the left of Boston Girls with a left hand in a jug and a right hand on the sloper next to it. Go right to the crimp over the lip (same as the left hand start of Boston Girls) then go left to a crimp slightly above head height, right hand to jug directly over the head, match with the left, right hand to the moon shaped crimp, got out left to a sloper then top out
content.location: In the cave to the left of Boston Girls on the Geurilla Boulder

content.description: Start on the fairly obvious undercling. Move right towards the obvious top right corner of the boulder to top out. You can either use the top edge of the boulder (V1), or avoid grabbing the top edge of the boulder (V2) until topout.
content.location: The Traverse Boulder is about 25 yards south of the Gorilla Boulder

content.description: Start with a right hand in a shallow crack and a left hand on a small crimp about chest height. Campus to a jug with the left, get your feet up and go to a moon shaped crimp with the right then throw out with the left to sloper and then top out.
content.location: On the Guerrilla Boulder, to the left of lime disease on the overhang face of the boulder

content.description: Start with a left on a crimp about head height on the main face of the traverse boulder and a right on a crimp on the overhanging side of the boulder. Go right to an intermediate crimp and then bump to a better full pad crimp. Heel hook on the left hand starting hold and go up left to a 3 finger crimp. Go out right to a crimp about head height and then go up just a couple inches to a two finger pocket. Pull up and get a foot on the right hand crimp and then top out,
content.location: On the overhang of the Traverse Boulder

climbs.name: 20 Degrees and a Faggot of Wood

content.location: Farthest right route in The Saloon, rating is marked just below the starting holds.
